old: <KC ATTACK1>後、少し遅らせて<KC ATTACK1>を連続して押す
new:
After <KC ATTACK1>, delay a moment then
repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1>.
While in the air, press <KC ATTACK1>.

old: <PADM>空中で左スティックを倒しながら<KC ATTACK1>を押す<KEYM>空中で移動キーを押しながら<KC ATTACK1>を押す
new:
While in the air, press <PADM><KC ATTACK1> while
moving the left stick<KEYM><KC ATTACK1> while
holding movement keys</KEYM>.
While in the air, press <KC JUMP>.

old: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>を連続して押す
new:
While climbing an enemy,
repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1>

old: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>を連続して押す
new:
While climbing an enemy,
repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1>
